news_room.models module

User, publisher, article, and newsletter models for the NewsRoom app.

Includes custom user roles, relationship mappings, and core content models.

class news_room.models.Article(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: Model

An article authored by a journalist and reviewed by editors.

title

Article headline.

Type:

str

description

Brief summary or teaser.

Type:

str

content

Full body of the article.

Type:

str

approved

Whether the article is approved for publishing.

Type:

bool

needs_revision

Whether the article is flagged for edits.

Type:

bool

editor_feedback

Optional feedback from the editor.

Type:

str

author

Journalist who wrote the article.

Type:

CustomUser

publisher

Publishing organization.

Type:

Publisher

created_at

Timestamp of initial creation.

Type:

datetime

updated_at

Timestamp of last modification.

Type:

datetime

news_room.permissions module

Role setup script for creating base user groups and assigning permissions.

This script can be run during initial migration or seeding to ensure Reader, Editor, and Journalist groups have appropriate model-level access.

news_room.permissions.create_roles()

Define role-based groups and assign Django model permissions.

Groups created:

  • Reader: view access only

  • Editor: view, change, delete access

  • Journalist: full CRUD access

Permissions cover Article and Newsletter models.

news_room.serializers module

DRF serializers for articles, newsletters, publishers, and authors.

Serializers include nested fields for relational context.

news_room.signals module

Signals triggered on article save events.

On approval, sends emails to subscribers and posts to X (Twitter) via OAuth.

news_room.signals.notify_on_approval(sender, instance, created, **kwargs)

Notify readers and post to X when an article is approved.

  • Emails are sent to all subscribed readers of the publisher and journalist.

  • A post is published to X using OAuth credentials.

  • Triggered only on update (not creation) where approved and not flagged for revision.

news_room.tests module

news_room.urls module

news_room.views module

Views for NewsRoom application.

Handles authentication, article and newsletter management, subscriptions, publisher creation, directory browsing, and REST API endpoints. Role-based access is enforced for readers, journalists, and editors.

news_room.views.approve_article_view(request, article_id)

Approve an article and clear its revision flags.

Parameters:

article_id (int) – ID of article to approve.

Returns:

Redirect to review list.

Return type:

HttpResponse

Return type:

HttpResponse

news_room.views.create_newsletter_view(request)

Allow journalists to compose and publish a newsletter.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – Form data containing newsletter fields.

Returns:

Form page or redirect to dashboard on success.

Return type:

HttpResponse

news_room.views.dashboard_view(request)

Render dashboard view.

Readers and journalists see all approved articles and newsletters. Editors see an empty view.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – Current user request.

Returns:

Rendered dashboard page.

Return type:

HttpResponse

Returns:

Rendered directory page with grouped profiles.

Return type:

HttpResponse

Returns:

HttpResponse
